english.segment1: (Chorus). I waited. For the Lord on high. I waited. And He heard my cry
english.segment2: He pulled me out of my despair. He taught me how to walk. From fear into security. From quicksand to the Rock
english.segment4: I sing to let the people know. That I have been restored. And they will kneel and understand. To return and trust in the Lord
english.segment6: And there's a new song. In my heart to sing. There's a new song. Praises for my King
